actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the taxation of up to one-half of an individual's social security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the taxation of social security benefits and tier I railroad retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the taxation of up to one-half of an individual's social security and certain railroad retirement benefits in gross income.
